name: Audit C3 docs for stale references

input.description: List all source code files in the project
List all source code files in the project

file.content:
# Table of Contents

## Containers

- [c3-1-api](c3-1-api/README.md)

## Components

### c3-1-api
- [c3-101-entry-point](c3-1-api/c3-101-entry-point.md)
- [c3-102-auth-middleware](c3-1-api/c3-102-auth-middleware.md) - STALE: file removed in v2
- [c3-103-post-routes](c3-1-api/c3-103-post-routes.md) - STALE: consolidated into index.ts
- [c3-104-comment-routes](c3-1-api/c3-104-comment-routes.md) - STALE: consolidated into index.ts
- [c3-105-database](c3-1-api/c3-105-database.md) - STALE: removed, using inline data

# Blog API - C3 Architecture

## Overview

Blog API provides endpoints for blog posts and comments.

## Containers

| ID | Name | Purpose |
|----|------|---------|
| c3-1 | api | REST API server |

## Quick Links

- [API Container](c3-1-api/README.md)

# c3-1-api: REST API Server

## Purpose

Main API server for blog functionality.

## Components

| ID | Name | Location | Status |
|----|------|----------|--------|
| c3-101 | entry-point | src/index.ts | Active |
| c3-102 | auth-middleware | src/middleware/auth.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-103 | post-routes | src/routes/posts.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-104 | comment-routes | src/routes/comments.ts | STALE - file removed |
| c3-105 | database | src/db.ts | STALE - file removed |

# c3-101: Entry Point

## Purpose

Application entry point.

## Location

`src/index.ts`

## Status

Active - this file exists.

# c3-102: Auth Middleware

## Purpose

JWT authentication middleware.

## Location

`src/middleware/auth.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Auth is now handled inline in index.ts.

## Dependencies

- jsonwebtoken library (removed)

# c3-103: Post Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for blog posts.

## Location

`src/routes/posts.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

## Endpoints (historical)

- GET /posts
- POST /posts
- GET /posts/:id
- PUT /posts/:id
- DELETE /posts/:id

# c3-104: Comment Routes

## Purpose

CRUD operations for comments on posts.

## Location

`src/routes/comments.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.

# c3-105: Database Layer

## Purpose

Database abstraction for persistence.

## Location

`src/db.ts`

## Status

STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring.
Data is now mocked inline.

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-102 (auth-middleware) references non-existent src/middleware/auth.ts
expectations.reasoning: The output clearly shows c3-102 references src/middleware/auth.ts with status 'STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring. Auth is now handled inline in index.ts.'

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-103 (post-routes) references non-existent src/routes/posts.ts
expectations.reasoning: The output clearly shows c3-103 references src/routes/posts.ts with status 'STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring. Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.'

expectations.text: Agent identifies c3-104 (comment-routes) references non-existent src/routes/comments.ts
expectations.reasoning: The output clearly shows c3-104 references src/routes/comments.ts with status 'STALE - This file was removed in v2 refactoring. Routes are now defined inline in index.ts.'

expectations.text: Agent recommends updating docs to reflect consolidated index.ts structure
expectations.reasoning: While the output identifies stale references and notes that functionality moved to index.ts, it does not provide actionable recommendations for how to update the documentation. The output simply displays the current doc state with STALE markers but lacks explicit recommendations like 'consolidate these components into a single document' or 'archive obsolete component docs' or specific steps to take.

judgment.summary: The agent successfully identified all stale component references (c3-102 through c3-105) and recognized the v2 consolidation into index.ts. However, it failed to provide actionable recommendations for updating the documentation - it only displayed the current state with STALE markers rather than suggesting how to fix the docs.
